usage.primary_action: bg-primary text-white (Dynamic via API, default Black or Gold)

spacing.touch_targets: Min 60px x 60px for all interactive elements

kiosk_grid.description: 2-column layout. Left Sidebar (25%) for Navigation/Categories. Right Content (75%) for Grid.
kiosk_grid.responsive: On 21.5 inch, standard layout. On 32 inch, increase padding and font sizes (use '2xl:' prefix in Tailwind).

layout_strategies.card_style: Minimalist. Image takes 60% height. Text below. Add Button is a clear circle or pill.

Navigation.style: Vertical sidebar. Icons + Text. Active state has a vertical line indicator.

MenuCard.style: Image top, Title serif, Price sans-serif. 'Add' button prominent.

NumberPad.style: Grid of numbers 1-9, 0. Large buttons (80px+). No keyboard.

CartDrawer.style: Slide from right. Summary of items. Large 'Checkout' button.

universal_guidelines: TOUCH FIRST: All buttons must be large enough for a finger.
NO SCROLLBARS: Hide scrollbars using 'scrollbar-hide' utility but allow scrolling.
DYNAMIC BRANDING: The 'primary' color should be CSS variable based so API can update it.
ACCESSIBILITY: High contrast text. Clear feedback on touch.
ANIMATION: Smooth transitions between pages. No jarring cuts. Use Framer Motion for page exits.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind config with the 'Morning Luxury' palette.
2. Create the 'NumberPad' component immediately as it's core to the 'No Keyboard' constraint.
3. Build the 'Layout' with a persistent Sidebar for categories.
4. Mock the API for 'Brand Colors' in a Context Provider (e.g., ThemeContext).
5. Use the selected images for the mock data.
